data_table.description: Medications Reported at Clinic Exam (ATC coded), Offspring Exam 9 and Omni 1 Exam 4

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study participant identifier within cohort (counts are observations, not participants)
variable.comment: Please see note on the first page. This variable is one of several variables used to define a unique record.

variable.name: medname
variable.description: Medication name (character variable)
variable.comment: This variable is one of several variables used to define a unique record. Variable that define a unique record are: IDTYPE, ID, EXAM, MEDNAME, MEDSTREN, MEDNUM, MEDPER, MEDPRN. "NO MEDS LISTED" = there were no medications listed on the form. However, it may not necessarily imply that the participant is not taking any medications. The same drug may be recorded in more than one record for an individual participant. This is because the participant took the medication at more than one strength and/or dose. The text written on the form was preserved "as is". There could be some misspellings, etc. Blank = Field not filled in. Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: medstren
variable.description: Medication strength (character variable)
variable.comment: This variable is one of several variables used to define a unique record. Variable that define a unique record are: IDTYPE, ID, EXAM, MEDNAME, MEDSTREN, MEDNUM, MEDPER, MEDPRN. Blank = Field not filled in. Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: mednum
variable.description: Number taken for given period (MEDPER)
variable.comment: This variable is one of several variables used to define a unique record. Variable that define a unique record are: IDTYPE, ID, EXAM, MEDNAME, MEDSTREN, MEDNUM, MEDPER, MEDPRN. This variable should be used in conjunction with MEDPER.

variable.name: medper
variable.description: Period range
variable.comment: This variable is one of several variables used to define a unique record. Variable that define a unique record are: IDTYPE, ID, EXAM, MEDNAME, MEDSTREN, MEDNUM, MEDPER, MEDPRN. This variable should be used in conjunction with MEDNUM.

variable.name: medprn
variable.description: Medication taken as needed
variable.comment: This variable is one of several variables used to define a unique record. Variable that define a unique record are: IDTYPE, ID, EXAM, MEDNAME, MEDSTREN, MEDNUM, MEDPER, MEDPRN.

variable.name: medbag
variable.description: Medication bag with medications brought to exam or med bottles/pack used by examiner to complete form?
variable.comment: If MEDNAME = "NO MEDS LISTED" then MEDBAG set to 0=NO. If MEDBAG=0 participant did not bring medications to the exam. Medications can still be reported by the participant.

variable.name: atc_cod1
variable.description: ATC code for medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: This dataset includes ALL participants who attended Offspring Exams 9 and Omni Exam 4. If participant did not list any medications, MEDNAME was set to "NO MEDS LISTED" and ATC_COD1 set to "NO_MEDS". Some medications were coded as "NO_CODE", which means that either there is no code for it (for example supplements, herbal preparations, homeopathic remedies, etc.) or the medication's name did not have enough information for coding. Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: atc_cod2
variable.description: ATC code for second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or single drug Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: atc_cod3
variable.description: ATC code for third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or no third compound Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: atc_cod4
variable.description: ATC code for fourth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or no fourth compound Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: system1
variable.description: Description/label for anatomical main group - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds or not coded Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: system2
variable.description: Description/label for anatomical main group - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or single drug Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: system3
variable.description: Description/label for anatomical main group - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or no third compound Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: system4
variable.description: Description/label for anatomical main group - forth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or no fourth compound Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: ther_gp1
variable.description: Description/label for therapeutic subgroup - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or first drug does not have therapeutic subgroup specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: ther_gp2
variable.description: Description/label for therapeutic subgroup - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or second drug does not have therapeutic subgroup specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: ther_gp3
variable.description: Description/label for therapeutic subgroup - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or third drug does not have therapeutic subgroup specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: ther_gp4
variable.description: Description/label for therapeutic subgroup - forth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or fourth drug does not have therapeutic subgroup specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: phrm_gp1
variable.description: Description/label for pharmacological subgroup - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or first drug does not have pharmacological subgroup specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: phrm_gp2
variable.description: Description/label for pharmacological subgroup - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or second drug does not have pharmacological subgroup specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: phrm_gp3
variable.description: Description/label for pharmacological subgroup - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or third drug does not have pharmacological subgroup specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: phrm_gp4
variable.description: Description/label for pharmacological subgroup - forth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or fourth drug does not have pharmacological subgroup specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: chem_gp1
variable.description: Description/label for chemical subgroup - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or first drug does not have chemical subgroup specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: chem_gp2
variable.description: Description/label for chemical subgroup - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or second drug does not have chemical subgroup specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: chem_gp3
variable.description: Description/label for chemical subgroup - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or third drug does not have chemical subgroup specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: chem_gp4
variable.description: Description/label for chemical subgroup - forth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or fourth drug does not have chemical subgroup specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: chem_nm1
variable.description: Description/label for chemical substance - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or first drug does not have chemical substance specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: chem_nm2
variable.description: Description/label for chemical substance - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or second drug does not have chemical substance specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: chem_nm3
variable.description: Description/label for chemical substance - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or third drug does not have chemical substance specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: chem_nm4
variable.description: Description/label for chemical substance - forth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or fourth drug does not have chemical substance specified Coded = Code assigned.

variable.name: nomeds
variable.description: Medication taken (check NO if no meds taken)

variable.name: route
variable.description: Medication route

variable.name: medotc
variable.description: Medication over the counter

variable.name: exam
variable.description: Exam number (counts are observations, not participants)
variable.comment: This variable is one of several variables used to define a unique record. Variable that define a unique record are: IDTYPE, ID, EXAM, MEDNAME, MEDSTREN, MEDNUM, MEDPER, MEDPRN.
